name: World of Tennis: Roaring ’20s
description: World of Tennis: Roaring ’20s is a realistic tennis game featuring global multiplayer and tactical gameplay across a variety of incredible, life-like locations – all set in the roaring ’20s!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 series or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 5770 (1 GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
